reviews.review:
哇真的是神作，关卡设计非常精妙，机器人的配音特别可爱而且有趣，片尾曲好好听！！
在自己冥思苦想解出答案之后特别有成就感
多人游戏坑基友其乐无穷hhhhh
Önce Portal 1'i, sonra 2 yi oynayın anlamazsınız.

Apesar de ser relativamente curto, o conteúdo que a comunidade fornece preenche bem esse espaço que falta.  Além do multiplayer, que não é um problema visto que quase toda hora o jogo está por 2 reais na steam. Então, vale a pena
Если вы любите проводить время с другом за какой либо игрой, то эта игра для вас.
amazing game great writing and amazing game play
Игра топ, играйте с друзьями, в соло-скучновато....
Un juego excepcional y súper recomendado. Mis 10!

买了好几年，想起来的时候玩一下，剧情差不多全忘了。
在暗无天日的深渊工厂里，压抑的喘不过气，不知道自己在哪里，凭感觉到处钻，多少次闭着眼睛往下跳，有时候简直吓得尿裤子，腿都在颤抖。（恐高的不建议玩）
而今天，我，打开了新世界的大门！天空从未如此舒心！麦浪从未如此芳香！太爽了！
当然双人模式才是最吼玩的！芜湖！不过我明明记得双人的我也和小伙伴通关了呀？怎么没成就呢？难道是1？一会儿看看再
No fim nada importa, exceto tirar um pombo de cima do teclado, 5 horas para remover um pombo de cima de um teclado.
IY IS THE BEST GANE TI  VERAWA
游戏很好玩，准备回去玩1，建议开字幕提醒不然有的时候英文会过得有点快，总体来讲很好。游戏当中有一些部分会感觉比较黑暗风，但是不是恐怖游戏。

uno de mis videojuegos favoritos




i hate portals..
it gives me nostalgia and it is just genrally a good game and the puzzles are at a difficulty when the answer just hits you
Very epic puzzle game. Cucky the chicken from the sonic franchise approves of this

Aussi génial que le premier, avec un mode coop qui rajoute du fun au jeu.
Toujours aussi excellent !
you make portals. go in one portal and come out the other
Very entertaining game to play with friends, you can definitely kill a few (a lot) hours goofing around while solving puzzles.
Es mucho mejor que el primero, si bien continúa su historia, así que primero juega al 1! Supieron mejorar mucho al primero, excelente juego.
This is one of the BEST games I've ever played and it don't require high specs!
It's very fun, play with friends!
Awesome game! Good storyline, and also has some funny lines, like paradoxes.
Really good and fun game when you just want to chill
I was asked and yes I do.
If you thought that Portal was great, you've seen nothing yet. Buy this game. You shall see the light...
Very good, puzzle gud, I don’t have any friends so I haven’t tried co-op, played some community test chambers ngl pretty good, videos are good, Easter eggs are good and rat man dens are good
Отличная игра что бы позабавится с другом , сюжет хороший совместной игры и обычный сюжет хороший прохожу его до сих пор
Has only one fault: too short.
This is by far the best game experience I've ever had. The story is immersive, intriguing, and epic and on a technical level the game still holds up in 2019. Completely worth playing.

ICH BIN DURCH, es war ein langer, aber wirklich spannender Weg. Die Storry ist in meinen Augen wirklich gut, aber wenn man sie erleben möchte sollte man sich den 1. Teil(der gerade im Bundle fast gratis ist). Wenn es jetzt noch die Möglichkeit gäbe dieses Spiel für die Steam-Awards zu nominieren würde ich es auf jeden Fall machen. Es lohnt sich!
its a good game after all these years

It's Portal no review needed, because we all know......
The Cake is A Lie
Hra dohrána za 5 hodin s kooperaci a určitě stojí za to :) Je plná zábavy i dobrých komentářů :D Doporučuji :)
Залипнуть на несколько дней, так сказать отдохнуть от других игр...
only played the single player story but was the best 70p ive spent, though i recommend playing portal 1 first
try the co-op mode, got the most laughs from that
Это игра с потрясающе сюжетом и порталами :3 Это все что я могу сказать о ней
Akışkan senaryo,eğlenceli bulmacalar,beyninizde çakan şimşekler ve konuşkan karakterleriyle işte size Portal 2.İndirimdeyken kaçırmayın derim.

Extremely creative and hilarious. The dialogue is extremely well written and adds an ironic humor to the entire game. Gameplay is thought provoking but rarely irritating. The levels are creative but still solvable and force you to be inventive.
el puto Amancitockrack me ha esclavizado como su putita de logros pero me lo he pasado bien
Portal is a classic in my book. A unique mixture of setting, dialogue, puzzles, intrigue and humor. Replayabliity is amazing especially since there is a both a unique solo and co-op campaign.
